item.title: Netflix Unveils First Look at Louis Partridge, James Norton, Emily Fairn and Anthony Boyle in ‘House of Guinness,’ Sets September Launch Date
item.description: From ‘Peaky Blinders’ mastermind Steven Knight, the new show is set in 19th-century New York and Dublin and follows one of Europe’s most enduring dynasties.
